content: CFS-SL GP Firestop gangplate Stud- or surface-mounted gangplate to increase the capacity of firestop speed sleeves and simplify cable management ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Integrated smoke seal – no additional products required Suitable for new builds and renovation – before or after drywall installation Ready-to-use right out of the package – no assembly required Can be stacked in rows or columns Gangplate cap available for blank openings and reserving space for future capacity changes Applications Wood or steel stud construction For use on drywall, concrete, masonry and sandwich panel Electrical, low-voltage/mid-voltage and telecom Assembling multiple cable management devices before the drywall is in place, or after drywall installation New and renovation construction projects ### TECHNICAL DATA: Maximum wall thickness: 300 Product Class: Ultimate Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | Maximum wall thickness | 300 | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 212 °F ### ITEMS- 2064273 - FS gangplate CFS-SL GP 16 - Package Size 2 pc - 3501662 - FS gangplate 16 exp pack - single - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x FS gangplate CFS-SL GP 16 - 6x FS gangplate cap CFS-SL GP CAP - 2064274 - FS gangplate CFS-SL GP 24 - Package Size 2 pc - 3501753 - FS gangplate 24 exp pack - single - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x FS gangplate CFS-SL GP 24 - 8x FS gangplate cap CFS-SL GP CAP - 2064275 - FS gangplate cap CFS-SL GP CAP - Package Size 1 pc
